channel.title: pytest on Technical Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in pytest on Technical Ramblings

item.title: Parameterize Python Tests
item.description: Introduction A single test case follows a pattern. Setup the data, invoke the function or method with the arguments and assert the return data or the state changes. A function will have a minimum of one or more test cases for various success and failure cases. Here is an example implementation of wc command for a single file that returns number of words, lines, and characters for an ASCII text file.
